About Me.

Hey there! I’m Agyei Lomini, an enthusiastic game developer with a flair for Computer Science and Design! I absolutely love diving into gameplay programming, systems architecture, and AI development, and I’ve got hands-on experience with Unity and C#.
My passion lies in problem-solving, prototyping, and crafting scalable systems that create unforgettable player experiences! Right now, I’m leading the charge on an exciting indie project, utilizing my skills in state machine combat design and technical systems integration.
I enjoy whipping up smaller prototypes to experiment with new mechanics, refine workflows, and enhance my tech skills. I’m passionate about collaborating with others to transform exciting design ideas into polished experiences, and I’m always ready to tackle challenges ignite my creativity and engineering expertise!
